hotels.title: Idyllic Bali Beachfront Resort with Swimming Pool, Spa & Ocean-View Restaurants
hotels.description: Escape the crowds and slip into island serenity at this beachfront resort, tucked away on Bali’s quieter east coast. Candi Beach Resort & Spa delivers palm-fringed shoreline, contemporary suites and bungalows, panoramic ocean views and distinctive dining venues, perfect for lazy days by the beach or a romantic hideaway. Set amid coconut groves and tropical gardens in Candidasa, this peaceful slice of paradise feels worlds away, yet close to Bali’s cultural heart. Dive into crystal-clear waters, dine beachfront under the stars, or hop on a scooter to explore hidden temples. With yoga classes, diving and three dreamy pools, it’s got everything for a relaxed, feel-good escape.
